techmeme.title: Unlike most mainstream social networks, Instagram has failed to scrub Kanye's pro-Nazi song "Heil Hitler", with several posts garnering 1M+ views (Matthew Gault/404 Media)
TikTok launches TikTok AI Alive, which lets users turn static photos into videos in TikTok Stories using Story Camera (Aisha Malik/TechCrunch)
Google rebrands Find My Device to Find Hub, which recently added a People tab to track contacts, and adds UWB support to the app for more precise tracking (Dominic Preston/The Verge)
Sources: Trump's admin mulls a deal to let UAE import 500K of the most advanced AI chips each year until 2027; one-fifth would go to G42, the others to US firms (Bloomberg)
Google will add Gemini to Wear OS 6, Android Auto, Google TV, and Android XR later this year (Guemmy Kim/The Keyword)
